hero.label: The System
hero.title: AI Literate™
hero.subtitle: The system for designing and running practical AI training.

definition.label: What AI Literate Is
definition.title: AI Literate is not a course.
definition.description: It's a system for designing AI training that leaves artifacts behind:
items: Explicit decisions on what to automate and what not to
Shared decision frameworks teams keep using
definition.tagline: If nothing remains after training, nothing changed.

comparison.label: System vs Delivery
comparison.title:
AI Literate defines the system.
Workshops are how it's delivered.
comparison.description: AI Literate is the underlying system for designing and running AI training. It defines:
items: What gets taught and what doesn't
How workflows are built and reused
How AI becomes leverage instead of theater
comparison.context: That system can be delivered through different workshop formats, depending on context.
comparison.tagline: No format is privileged. The system stays the same.

partnership.label: How People Partner
partnership.title: AI Literate scales through partnerships.
partnership.description: If you want repeatable results, you don’t need new tools. You need a better system.

proof.label: In Practice
proof.title: AI Bootcamp with April Sabral Leadership
proof.tagline: That wasn’t accidental. It was AI Literate applied.

cta.label: Next Steps
cta.title: Interested in partnering with AI Literate?
cta.description: To explore workshops or partnerships, DM on LinkedIn.
